alert.note: Alert for Laramie Foothills and High Plains; North Snowy Range Foothills; Sierra Madre Range, Medicine Bow NF; Snowy Range, Medicine Bow NF; Southern Laramie Range; Southern Laramie Valley; Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 19 at 3:21AM MDT until September 19 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WIDESPREAD CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS EXPECTED TODAY... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 424, 425, 426, 427, 428, 429, AND 430... The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 11 AM this morning to 8 PM MDT this evening. * WIND...West to southwest 15 to 25 MPH with gusts up to 35 MPH. * HUMIDITY...8 to 12 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Laramie Foothills and High Plains; North Snowy Range Foothills; Sierra Madre Range, Medicine Bow NF; Snowy Range, Medicine Bow NF; Southern Laramie Range; Southern Laramie Valley; Upper North Platte River Basin
